casebody.data:
Myrna F. LaBow v. Ronald I. LaBow Ronald I. LaBow, pro se, in support of the motion. John W. Colleran, in support of the motion. Submitted April 14 decided May 17, 1977 Submitted April 20

decided May 17, 1977

The defendant’s motion for a review of the order, dated February 22, 1977, of the trial court terminating the stay of execution in the appeal from the Superior Court in Fairfield County is granted and the relief sought therein is denied.

The plaintiff’s motion to dismiss the defendant’s motion for review dated April 4, 1977, is denied.
